title: Iterator for Combination
content:
Design an Iterator class, which has:

A constructor that takes a string  of sorted distinct lowercase English letters and a number  as arguments.
A function next() that returns the next combination of length  in lexicographical order.
A function hasNext() that returns  if and only if there exists a next combination.

 


 



There will be at most  function calls per test.
It's guaranteed that all calls of the function  are valid.
